math/

jbcrossp.pro


top source jbcrossp

Math

result = jbcrossp(v1, v2)

Calculate the cross products between two arrays of 3-vectors.

Return value

A 3xN array, where each Result[*,i] 3-vector is equal to CROSSP(V1[*,i], V2[*,i]).

Parameters

v1 in

First 3xN array.

v2 in

Second 3xN array.

Examples

IDL> a = [ [0.1, -1.0, 3.5], [-1.0, -1.0, 4.0] ] IDL> b = [ [0.2, -2.0, 7.0], [2.5, -2.5, 1.0] ] IDL> PRINT, JBCROSSP(a,b) 0.00000 0.00000 0.00000 9.00000 11.0000 5.00000

Author information
